double_jeopardy.clue_text: Borgen's Cafe, on Main St. in Westby, Wisconsin, feels a bit like Oslo, with menus & banter in this language

'60s Dylan classic that begins, "Once upon a time you dressed so fine"

jeopardy.clue_text: Rivaner is a profitable type of this planted in Luxembourg's Moselle Valley
